name: Ability Capsule
effect: A capsule that allows a Pokemon with two Abilities to switch between these Abilities when it is used.

name: Ability Urge
effect: When used, it activates the Ability of an ally Pokemon.

name: Abomasite
effect: Enables Abomasnow to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Absolite
effect: Enables Absol to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Absorb Bulb
effect: A consumable bulb. If the holder is hit by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk will rise.

name: Adamant Orb
effect: Increases the power of Dragon-​ and Steel-type moves when held by Dialga.

name: Adventure Rules
effect: This book contains all the points a new Trainer needs to know on a journey. It was handmade by a kind friend.

name: Aerodactylite
effect: Enables Aerodactyl to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Aggronite
effect: Enables Aggron to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Aguav Berry
effect: Restores HP if it's low, but may cause confusion.

name: Air Balloon
effect: When held by a Pokemon, the Pokemon will float into the air. When the holder is attacked, this item will burst.

name: Alakazite
effect: Enables Alakazam to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Ampharosite
effect: Enables Ampharos to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Amulet Coin
effect: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It doubles a battle’s prize money if the holding Pokemon joins in.

name: Antidote
effect: A spray-type medicine. It lifts the effect of poison from one Pokemon.

name: Apicot Berry
effect: Raises Special Defense when HP is low.

name: Armor Fossil
effect: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokemon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a collar.

name: Aspear Berry
effect: If held by a Pokemon, it defrosts it.

name: Awakening
effect: A spray-type medicine. It awakens a Pokemon from the clutches of sleep.

name: Babiri Berry
effect: Weakens a supereffective Steel-type attack against the holding Pokemon.

name: BalmMushroom
effect: A rare mushroom which gives off a nice fragrance. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Banettite
effect: Enables Banette to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Belue Berry
effect: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Berry Juice
effect: A 100% pure juice made of Berries. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by just 20 points.

name: Big Mushroom
effect: A large and rare mushroom. It is sought after by collectors.

name: Big Nugget
effect: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Big Pearl
effect: A quite-large pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

name: Big Root
effect: Recovers more HP from HP-stealing moves.

name: Binding Band
effect: A band that increases the power of binding moves when held.

name: Black Belt
effect: Increases the power of Fighting-type moves.

name: Black Flute
effect: A toy flute made from black glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Black Sludge
effect: A held item that gradually restores the HP of Poison-type Pokemon. It inflicts damage on all other types.

name: BlackGlasses
effect: Increases the power of Dark-type moves.

name: Blastoisinite
effect: Enables Blastoise to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Blazikenite
effect: Enables Blaziken to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Blk Apricorn
effect: A black Apricorn It has an indescribable scent.

name: Blu Apricorn
effect: A blue Apricorn. It smells a bit like grass.

name: Blue Flute
effect: A toy flute made from blue glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Blue Scarf
effect: Raises holder's Beauty aspect in a Contest.

name: Blue Shard
effect: A small blue shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.

name: Bluk Berry
effect: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: BrightPowder
effect: Lowers the opponent’s accuracy.

name: Bug Gem
effect: Increases the power of a Bug-type move only once.

name: Burn Drive
effect: Changes Techno Blast to a Fire-type move when held by Genesect.

name: Burn Heal
effect: A spray-type medicine. It heals a single Pokemon that is suffering from a burn.

name: Calcium
effect: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. It raises the base Sp. Atk (Special Attack) stat of a single Pokemon.

name: Carbos
effect: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. It raises the base Speed stat of a single Pokemon.

name: Casteliacone
effect: Castelia City’s specialty, soft-serve ice cream. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokemon.

name: Cell Battery
effect: A consumable battery. If the holder is hit by an Electric-type move, its Attack will rise.

name: Charcoal
effect: Increases the power of Fire-type moves.

name: Charizardite X
effect: Enables Charizard to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Charizardite Y
effect: Enables Charizard to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Charti Berry
effect: Weakens a supereffective Rock-type attack against the holding Pokemon.

name: Cheri Berry
effect: If held by a Pokemon, it recovers from paralysis.

name: Cherish Ball
effect: A quite rare Poke Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.

name: Chesto Berry
effect: If held by a Pokemon, it recovers from sleep.

name: Chilan Berry
effect: Weakens a Normal-type attack against the Pokemon holding this berry.

name: Chill Drive
effect: Changes Techno Blast to an Ice-type move when held by Genesect.

name: Choice Band
effect: Raises Attack, but only one move can be used.

name: Choice Scarf
effect: Raises Speed, but only one move can be used.

name: Choice Specs
effect: Raises Special Attack, but only one move can be used.

name: Chople Berry
effect: Weakens a supereffective Fighting-type attack against the holding Pokemon.

name: Claw Fossil
effect: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a claw.

name: Cleanse Tag
effect: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It helps keep wild Pokemon away if the holder is the first one in the party.

name: Clever Wing
effect: Increases Special Defense EVs by 1.

name: Coba Berry
effect: Weakens a supereffective Flying-type attack against the holding Pokemon.

name: Colbur Berry
effect: Weakens a supereffective Dark-type attack against the holding Pokemon.

name: Colress Machine
effect: A special device that wrings out the potential of Pokemon. It is an imperfect prototype.

name: Comet Shard
effect: A shard which fell to the ground when a comet approached. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Cornn Berry
effect: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Cover Fossil
effect: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that lived in the sea in ancient times. It appears to be part of its back.

name: Custap Berry
effect: Holder can move first when HP is low.

name: Damp Mulch
effect: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Damp Rock
effect: A Pokemon held item that extends the duration of the move Rain Dance used by the holder.

name: Dark Gem
effect: Increases the power of a Dark-type move only once.

name: Dawn Stone
effect: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It sparkles like eyes.

name: DeepSeaScale
effect: Increases Special Defense when held by Clamperl.

name: DeepSeaTooth
effect: Increases Special Attack when held by Clamperl.

name: Destiny Knot
effect: A long, thin, bright-red string to be held by a Pokemon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the foe does too.

name: Dire Hit
effect: Raises critical-hit ratio of a Pokemon in battle.

name: Dire Hit 2
effect: It can be used many times to raise the critical-hit ratio of one Pokemon. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: Dire Hit 3
effect: It can be used many times to greatly raise a Pokemon’s critical-hit ratio. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: Dive Ball
effect: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well on Pokemon that live underwater.

name: DNA Splicers
effect: A splicer that fuses Kyurem and a certain Pokemon. They are said to have been one in the beginning.

name: Dome Fossil
effect: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a shell.

name: Douse Drive
effect: Changes Techno Blast to a Water-type move when held by Genesect.

name: Draco Plate
effect: Increases power of Dragon-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Dragon.

name: Dragon Fang
effect: Increases the power of Dragon-type moves.

name: Dragon Gem
effect: Increases the power of a Dragon-type move only once.

name: Dragon Scale
effect: A thick and tough scale. Dragon-type Pokemon may be holding this item when caught.

name: Dread Plate
effect: Increases power of Dark-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Dark.

name: Dream Ball
effect: A special Poke Ball that appears out of nowhere in a bag at the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokemon.

name: Dropped Item
effect: The Xtransceiver found at the Nimbasa City amusement park. It seems it belongs to a boy.

name: Dubious Disc
effect: A transparent device overflowing with dubious data. Its producer is unknown.

name: Durin Berry
effect: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Dusk Ball
effect: A somewhat different Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokemon at night or in dark places like caves.

name: Dusk Stone
effect: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.

name: Earth Plate
effect: Increases power of Ground-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Ground.

name: Eject Button
effect: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokemon in your party.

name: Electirizer
effect: A box packed with a tremendous amount of electric energy. It is loved by a certain Pokemon.

name: Electric Gem
effect: Increases the power of an Electric-type move only once.

name: Elevator Key
effect: A card key that activates the elevator in Lysandre Labs. It is emblazoned with Team Flare’s logo.

name: Elixir
effect: It restores the PP of all the moves learned by the targeted Pokemon by 10 points each.

name: Energy Root
effect: A very bitter root. It restores the HP of one POKeMON by 200 points.

name: EnergyPowder
effect: A very bitter medicine powder. It restores the HP of one POKeMON by 50 points.

name: Enigma Berry
effect: If held by a Pokemon, it restores its HP if it is hit by any supereffective attack.

name: Escape Rope
effect: A long, durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon.

name: Ether
effect: It restores the PP of a Pokemon’s selected move by a maximum of 10 points.

name: Everstone
effect: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The Pokemon holding this peculiar stone is prevented from evolving.

name: Eviolite
effect: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def of a Pokemon that can still evolve.

name: Exp. Share
effect: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder gets a share of a battle’s Exp. Points without battling.

name: Expert Belt
effect: Increases the power of super-effective moves.

name: Fairy Gem
effect: Increases the power of a Fairy-type move only once.

name: Fast Ball
effect: A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokemon which are quick to run away.

name: Fighting Gem
effect: Increases the power of a Fighting-type move only once.

name: Figy Berry
effect: Restores HP if it's low, but may cause confusion.

name: Fire Gem
effect: Increases the power of a Fire-type move only once.

name: Fire Stone
effect: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of POKeMON evolve. It is colored orange.

name: Fist Plate
effect: Increases power of Fighting-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Fighting.

name: Flame Orb
effect: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a bizarre orb that inflicts a burn on the holder in battle.

name: Flame Plate
effect: Increases power of Fire-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Fire.

name: Float Stone
effect: A very light stone. It reduces the weight of a Pokemon when held.

name: Fluffy Tail
effect: An item that attracts Pokemon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokemon.

name: Flying Gem
effect: Increases the power of a Flying-type move only once.

name: Focus Band
effect: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder may endure a potential KO attack, leaving it with just 1 HP.

name: Focus Sash
effect: An item to be held by a Pokemon. If it has full HP, the holder will endure one potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

name: Fresh Water
effect: Water with a high mineral content. It restores the HP of one POKeMON by 50 points.

name: Friend Ball
effect: A Poke Ball that makes caught Pokemon more friendly.

name: Full Heal
effect: A spray-type medicine. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokemon.

name: Full Incense
effect: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that makes the holder bloated and slow moving.

name: Full Restore
effect: A medicine that fully restores the HP and heals any status problems of a single Pokemon.

name: Ganlon Berry
effect: Raises Defense when HP is low.

name: Garchompite
effect: Enables Garchomp to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Gardevoirite
effect: Enables Gardevoir to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Gengarite
effect: Enables Gengar to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Genius Wing
effect: Increases Special Attack EVs by 1.

name: Ghost Gem
effect: Increases the power of a Ghost-type move only once.

name: Gooey Mulch
effect: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Grass Gem
effect: Increases the power of a Grass-type move only once.

name: Great Ball
effect: A good, high-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokemon catch rate than a standard Poke Ball.

name: Green Scarf
effect: Raises holder's Smart aspect in a Contest.

name: Green Shard
effect: A small green shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.

name: Grepa Berry
effect: Using it on a Pokemon makes it more friendly, but it also lowers its base Sp. Def stat.

name: Grip Claw
effect: A Pokemon held item that extends the duration of multiturn attacks like Bind and Wrap.
